CustomField.description: Used to specify a (shorter) name for the Contractor using the Service Territory in addition to the (longer) Service Territory Name. For Example: Hydrotech instead of "Hydrotech - Wastewater Reactive/Planned. This is used e.g. also in the Subcontractor Claims process to generate the "Pro Forma Invoice Format" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter a short name for the Contractor representing this Service Territory. For Example: Hydrotech
CustomField.label: Contractor Name
